title: JSON schema for redirects.json
description: The redirect.json file describes 302 FOUND redirections for linked data-purposes.

redirects.description: When multiple match, those with filters are preferred; if multiple matches remain, the first is preferred.
redirects.title: Redirection candidates.

path.title: Pathname, i.e. URL-part after the domain .
path.description: Begins with first `/`. Matches as a regex.

location.title: Redirection target.
location.description: Some variables ($ACCEPT_LANGUAGE, $REQUEST_URI_ESCAPED and regex groups $1..$9) are substituted.

accept.title: Accept-header filters.
accept.description: Multiple filters are combined using OR.
